definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_set_scoreboard_score"><value name="score"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tpa.target</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">engiesvanillaextras:accept_tpa</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.target] ["",{"text":"You have accepted ","color":"gold"},{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.sender]","color":"yellow"},{"text":"'s teleport request.","color":"gold"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.sender] ["",{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.target,limit=1]","color":"yellow"},{"text":" has accepted your teleport request.","color":"gold"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
